p: The allContent variable is a default prop loaded by the Plenti generator automatically. It holds the
field values for every piece of content on your site. This is very handy for creating lists, or creating aggregate
pages such as a "blog posts" landing page or "recent news" page.

sections.title: Filter allContent to get a specific type

p: By default allContent holds everything from your "content" folder.
